Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus CVCC1882 (MIC=23.3 µM), Sarcina lutea CVCC1600 (MIC=8 µM), Bacillus pumilus CVCC709 (MIC=9 µM), Bacillus subtilis CVCC717 (MIC=13.3 µM).Gram-positive bacterium:Escherichia coli CVCC1570 (MIC=16.7 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: These peptides have net positive charges and are active against both Gram-negative and -positive bacteria, but are not active against fungi tested.

Literature.Title: Novel antimicrobial peptides identified from an endoparasitic wasp cDNA library.
Literature.Author: Shen X, Ye G, Cheng X, Yu C, Yao H, Hu C.
